name: Tomodachi
description: A game about the friends we made along the way. Super vague references to anxiety and isolation. Standard RPG controls, arrow keys to move, 4 different endings to achieve. Make some friends, or don't. Fight Llama Worms, or don't. Be sure to turn down the volume in game, it's really loud and I couldn't change it for some reason! Made during the Supershigi leeble game jam!
